description: Jessy has a collection of 10 unique recipes. She can lend some/all recipes to Bob, a renowned chef, to include in his restaurant's menu. Each recipe triples the restaurant's customer engagement. Bob then decides how much of the profits from these recipes to share back with Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: lend all recipes to the chef

trustee_behavior_choices.return_none: share 0 profit from recipes with the collector
trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: share 40-50% of the recipe profits with the collector
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: share more than 80% of the recipe profits with the collector
